transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to reschedule an appointment I have coming up on Tuesday.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics. Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, this is Thomas Nguyen.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Thomas. Are you calling for yourself or for someone else today? How can I help you?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'm calling for myself. I need to reschedule my appointment.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Can you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, it's August 14, 2000.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm your details. I have your name as Thomas Nguyen and your date of birth as August fourteenth two thousand. Is that correct? If so, could you please spell your first and last name, for me?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct. My first name is Thomas, T-H-O-M-A-S, and my last name is Nguyen, N-G-U-Y-E-N.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look up your record using the phone number you have on file with us? If so, please tell me that number. If you're not sure, just let me know, and I'll confirm your name and date of birth again.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, you can use the phone number. It's 619-555-0142.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm. Your phone number is six one nine five five five zero one four two, and your date of birth is August fourteenth

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: That's correct.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: two thousand. Is that correct?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's right.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can't pull up your record right now, so I can't help with rescheduling at the moment. I'll make sure our clinic support team follows up with you. Please hold on while I document this for them.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I really need to reschedule today. Can you try looking up my appointment using my name and date of birth?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Live transfer isn't available right now since this is a

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Could you please try one more time to find my appointment using my name and date of birth? I need to make sure I get this rescheduled.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I understand how important this is. I'm unable to access your record without a match in our system.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Is there any way to escalate this or speak to someone else who might help with rescheduling today?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: So I can't reschedule your appointment right now. I'll make sure our clinic support team follows up you as soon as possible to help with your request.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I understand. Can you please ensure that they confirm both the cancellation of my current appointment and the new appointment time when they follow up?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Absolutely. I'll let the clinic support team know you want to reschedule your appointment and need

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you for your help. I look forward to hearing from them soon. Goodbye.
